instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PP5V_S0: What is PP5V_S0? PP5V_S0 is a 5v power rail present when the system is in an S0 working state..
definitions.PP3V3_S0: What is PP3V3_S0? The "PP3V3_S0" rail in a MacBook logic board is a power rail that supplies 3.3 volts to the system when it is fully awake (S0 state). .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B no keyboard backlight
threads.message:
Hi, got and <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B with no keyboard backlight.

Tried good sheet no light. Pressing keyboard backlight keys show icon. Iluminating camera shows prohibition symbol.

Replaced <CAPACITOR>C5855</CAPACITOR> because it had a bit of corrosion but no change.

Replaced <CHIP>U5850</CHIP> just in case.

i get <SIGNAL>PP5V_S0</SIGNAL> on L5850 and <SIGNAL>PP3V3_S0</SIGNAL> on <RESISTOR>R5853</RESISTOR>.

Resistances for <RESISTOR>R5855</RESISTOR>, <RESISTOR>R5854</RESISTOR> and <RESISTOR>R5853</RESISTOR> have correct values.

Theres continuity between <CHIP>U5850</CHIP> and its components.

<SIGNAL>SMC_SYS_KBDLED</SIGNAL>, <SIGNAL>KBDLED_SW</SIGNAL>, <SIGNAL>KBDLED_CAP</SIGNAL> and <SIGNAL>KBDLED_ANODE</SIGNAL> are all 0v.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B no keyboard backlight
threads.message: Be sure pin 2/<RESISTOR>R5854</RESISTOR> and pin 1/J5815 are grounded, when KB backlight flex is inserted.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B no keyboard backlight
threads.message: Yes, both grounded with kb bl sheet connected

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B no keyboard backlight
threads.message:
Just in case, change L5850.
I know few cases with bad coil...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B no keyboard backlight
threads.message: Replaced L5850, now i got bl. Thanks a lot
